name: Super Dice Mayhem!
description:
Welcome to Super Dice Mayhem! In this turn-based puzzle game you must reach the end of the game by going through 6 stages, each having obstacles and enemy dice in your path to victory. This game was made for the GDC GMTK Jam 2022 in under 50 hours.

HOW TO PLAY:

W - Hop Forward

A - Hop Left

S - Hop Backwards

D - Hop Right

Arrow Keys: Move the camera

Movement: Movement is dependent on the top of the dice. If you land on a 4 facing up, you will have 4 moves. If you land on a 6 facing up, you will have 6 moves. With each move, you can either hop to a tile, or attack.

Attacking: Attacking is based on the side you're facing your enemy. If you face an enemy die with a 4, you will do 4 damage.

Items: You will find various items in the game that change the sides of your die. If you land on a 5 with one of your sides, that side will then change to a 5. This will go for any side that you land on.

Game Design - nashdashin, Bimgus, King Aurous

3D Modeling - nashdashin

Programming - Bimgus(https://bimgusgaminf.itch.io/)

Music - King Aurous(https://kingaurorusmusic.com/)
